main event: A bright light, described as being about the size of a basketball and having a brilliant whitish color, was observed moving erratically at a high rate of speed in the sky over Liberal, Kansas on August 6, 1962.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 15 minutes before going out of sight.
Several people in the Liberal, Kansas area reported observing the light.
The object was reported to suddenly accelerate, decelerate, and make abrupt turns.
A previous sighting of a round, glowing reddish-orange object was reported in the same area on August 1, 1962.
The trajectory and apparent size of the object did not fit the characteristics of a jet aircraft or other conventional aircraft.
sighted object: a bright light, described as being about the size of a basketball and having a brilliant whitish color
